game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
this mod is the astral mod, with a few improvments, changes, and addons.

this mod includes new weather events(solar eclipses, harvest moon, and a pink colored moon.
changes/improvements to the code re-enable the cloud density function(which works in MT 5.7.0)

this mod will only be for MTG until I do further testing.
name: astral_redo
short_description: this is a fork of astral
title: Astral
